div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1852 Thatta, Attock district, Punjab, Paki- (1067) stan, c. 1885 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 20-30 AR Strato I and Agathocleia: tetradr. Strato I: tetradr. Philoxenus: tetradr. Diomedes: tetradr. Hermaeus: tetradr. Disposition: London 8 Gardner, NC 1887, pp. 181-4, illus. Whitehead, NC 1923, pp. 316-7
